resources.string:
Welcome to Cook Buddy! Here are the list of voice commands Cook Buddy supports. To activate voice commands, say "Cook Buddy" and then one of the following commands while on any recipe page.
 - "Previous" - Go to the previous step.
 - "Next" - Go to the next step.
 - "Call Author" - Call the author of the recipe.
 - "Set Timer" - Sets a timer for that step.
 - "Home" - Return to the home screen.
 - "Landing Page" - Go to first screen of current recipe.
 - "Text" - Text the author of the recipe.
